title: Beginner's Guide to Quilting [Epub & Mobi]
description:
Beginner's Guide to Quilting
Author: Elizabeth Betts
Published: May, 2013
Publisher: David & Charles
ISBN: 9781446302545
Formats: Retail Epub and Mobi
Reader required: 
Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Mobi- Kindle app (PC, ipad, iphone), Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Tested on the above readers on laptop and Android tablet with no problems.
Please allow a couple seconds for the seedboxes to engage and then it should be nice and quick.
Measurements for this book are in both metric and US Imperial, pattern templates are available (link in book) for free download with no registration required.
107 pages (epub)/ 16 projects
Enjoy :D 
________________________________________________________________________________

Learn how to make beautiful quilts with this comprehensive guide to patchwork and quilting for beginners. Covers all aspects of quilting from piecing and applique to quilting and binding. Choose from 16 simple projects, each focusing on a different technique, from bags and cushions to table mats, wall hangings and bed quilts.Clear illustrations and step-by-step instructions accompany each project, making them all suitable for even a complete novice. The book also includes a quilting glossary explaining common quilting and sewing terms.
